metadata.title: CVE-2021-43415 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description: HashiCorp Nomad and Nomad Enterprise up to 1.0.13, 1.1.7, and 1.2.0, withthe QEMU task driver enabled, allowed authenticated users with jobsubmission capabilities to bypass the configured allowed image paths. Fixedin 1.0.14, 1.1.8, and 1.2.1.

criterions.comment: nomad package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
